member.name: M:HIS_WebApi.inventoryController.POST_creat_add(HIS_DB_Lib.returnData)
member.summary: 創建盤點單(盤點單號自訂)
member.remarks:
[必要輸入參數說明]
1.[returnData.Value] : 盤點單名稱
--------------------------------------------
以下為範例JSON範例

member.name: M:HIS_WebApi.inspectionController.POST_creat_add(HIS_DB_Lib.returnData)
member.summary: 創建驗收單(驗收單號自訂)
member.remarks:
[必要輸入參數說明]
1.[returnData.Value] : 驗收單名稱
--------------------------------------------
以下為範例JSON範例
{ "Data": { "IC_NAME": "測試驗收", "IC_SN": "Q202230101-測試驗收單", "CT": "", "NOTE": "", "Contents": [ { "CODE": "220302IHYA", "SKDIACODE": "", "CHT_NAME": "Hyaluronate Sodium", "NAME": "(申報)Hyalgan膝爾康 關節腔注射劑", "PAKAGE": "Syri", "BARCODE1": "", "BARCODE2": "[]", "START_QTY": "0", "END_QTY": "0", "ADD_TIME": "2023/10/30 20:41:53", "NOTE": "", "Sub_content": [] }, { "CODE": "220IHYA", "SKDIACODE": "", "CHT_NAME": "Hyaluronate Sodium", "NAME": "(申報)Hyalgan膝爾康 關節腔注射劑", "PAKAGE": "", "BARCODE1": "", "BARCODE2": "[]", "START_QTY": "0", "END_QTY": "0", "ADD_TIME": "2023/10/30 20:41:53", "NOTE": "", "Sub_content": [] } ] } }

member.summary: 更新驗收單
member.remarks:
以下為範例JSON範例
